segments.text: I look at this kitchen and feel a pang for what's about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in drying that plate, missing the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's gently spilling out, creating a sad little puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in it, unaware of the damage spreading.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems so serene, highlighting the sorrow inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool reaches for cookies, but it looks so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He might fall and get hurt, breaking the moment of their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, her innocent reach tugging at my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids being kids, but the risks make it heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly, cookies in the jarâ€” all so ordinary, yet doomed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light, but can't brighten this impending gloom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a touching scene of family life, shadowed by carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
